user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Authentication and User Access Management
epics.summary: Develop a secure user login system with multi-factor authentication and robust access controls.
epics.description: Implement a sophisticated authentication framework using multi-factor authentication to ensure secure user access. Include features like session management, password encryption, and login attempt monitoring. The module must comply with global banking and data protection standards while maintaining user convenience. Integrate with an access management layer that defines and enforces role-based permissions, ensuring customers only access services relevant to their profiles.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
epics.summary: Design a modern, responsive, and intuitive user interface for the banking portal.
epics.description: Build a fully responsive front-end that provides a seamless and consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure accessibility standards are followed for usability by all customer segments. The interface should load quickly, maintain visual consistency, and employ interactive elements that enhance user engagement. Implement user experience testing and feedback loops to continually improve the interface.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Visibility
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard to display relevant banking products and offers.
epics.description: Develop a dynamic dashboard that displays banking products, services, and offers tailored to each customer’s profile and eligibility. Integrate personalization logic that leverages customer data to highlight recommended services. Ensure easy access to recent transactions, active accounts, and real-time notifications. Provide intuitive navigation for fast access to key actions like service requests or product applications.

epics.title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification
epics.summary: Enable customers to digitally open new accounts and modify existing services.
epics.description: Implement a streamlined digital workflow allowing customers to open new accounts, modify existing ones, or request new services directly through the portal. Use guided forms, prefilled data fields, and contextual validation to minimize effort and errors. Integrate approval and routing workflows to connect with internal bank systems for efficient processing. Ensure that all submitted data is securely transmitted and auditable.

epics.title: Save Draft Applications and Document Upload
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and securely upload supporting documents.
epics.description: Enable users to save their application progress as drafts and resume at any time without data loss. Develop secure file upload functionality supporting standard document formats. Apply encryption, format validation, and virus scanning to uploaded files. Display visual indicators for draft completion and document submission statuses to give users clear feedback throughout the process.

epics.title: Real-Time Request Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide customers with visibility into the status of their submitted requests through real-time updates and alerts.
epics.description: Build an event-driven architecture that tracks and displays the real-time progress of customer requests. Integrate notification services for email and SMS alerts at critical stages, such as submission, processing, and completion. Allow users to view all notifications within a unified portal inbox. Include options to customize notification preferences to improve engagement and transparency.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain detailed records of all user interactions for security and transparency.
epics.description: Implement a transaction and activity logging system that records user actions, submissions, modifications, and login attempts. Ensure that the logs are immutable, timestamped, and compliant with industry security standards. Provide customers with a view of their interaction history while ensuring sensitive details remain protected. Allow administrators to generate audit reports for compliance and monitoring purposes.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the customer portal with the bank’s existing core banking systems.
epics.description: Develop secure API connections and middleware components to synchronize customer data, product eligibility, and transaction details with the core banking system. Ensure data consistency and reliability through robust synchronization and error-handling mechanisms. The integration must follow security protocols and maintain performance efficiency without compromising the core system’s stability.

epics.title: Portal Data Layer and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Create a dedicated data management layer to enhance performance and resilience.
epics.description: Establish a separate portal database designed for fast retrieval and minimal dependency on the core banking platform. Implement caching and indexing strategies to provide a responsive user experience. Ensure database security through encryption, access control, and periodic penetration testing. Enable high availability and disaster recovery mechanisms to ensure uptime and data protection.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and User Access Management
user_stories.title: Implement multi-factor authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to authenticate using multiple factors, so that my account remains secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must include options like SMS and email for additional authentication factors.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User must be able to authenticate via two different methods.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they attempt to log in, then they must provide two forms of authentication.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and User Access Management
user_stories.title: Session management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to be managed effectively, so that unauthorized access can be prevented.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must include session timeout and invalidation on logout.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User session must timeout after a period of inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an authenticated user, when they are inactive, then the session should timeout after a configured period.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and User Access Management
user_stories.title: Password encryption
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my password to be stored securely, so that it is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Passwords must be encrypted using strong algorithms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Passwords should be encrypted and stored securely in the database.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new password, when it is saved, then it must be encrypted using a strong algorithm.

user_stories.epic_title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
user_stories.title: Develop responsive front-end
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a consistent experience across devices, so that I can use the portal on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal must be fully functional on all standard devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, when accessed from different devices, then it should provide a consistent user experience.

user_stories.epic_title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface Design
user_stories.title: Implement accessibility standards
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be accessible, so that it can be used by everyone, including those with disabilities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal must comply with accessibility standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, when used by a person with disabilities, then it should be fully accessible.

user_stories.title: Develop personalized dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a dashboard with relevant products and offers, so that I see only what interests me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must display products based on user profile and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard must show personalized products and offers.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user profile, when they log in, then the dashboard should display personalized products and offers.

user_stories.epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification
user_stories.title: Enable digital account opening
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to open a new account online, so that I don't have to visit the bank.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must include guided forms and prefilled data fields.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to open new accounts digitally.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, when they complete the form, then a new account should be opened.

user_stories.epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification
user_stories.title: Enable service modification
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify existing services online, so that I don't have to visit the bank.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must include guided forms and contextual validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to modify existing services digitally.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with existing services, when they submit a modification request, then the service should be updated.

user_stories.epic_title: Save Draft Applications and Document Upload
user_stories.title: Save draft applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save my application as a draft, so that I can complete it later.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to save and resume applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when saved as a draft, then it should be possible to resume later.

user_stories.epic_title: Save Draft Applications and Document Upload
user_stories.title: Implement secure file upload
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely, so that my sensitive information remains protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support standard document formats and include virus scanning.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to securely upload documents.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a document, when uploaded, then it must be securely stored and protected.

user_stories.epic_title: Real-Time Request Status Tracking and Notifications
user_stories.title: Track request status in real-time
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to track my request status in real-time, so that I am always informed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must include a unified portal inbox.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to view real-time status updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a submitted request, when it is processed, then the status should update in real-time.

user_stories.epic_title: Real-Time Request Status Tracking and Notifications
user_stories.title: Implement notification services
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive notifications about my requests, so that I know their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support email and SMS notifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be notified about request progress via email and SMS.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a processing request, when it reaches a critical stage, then a notification is sent to the user.

user_stories.epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
user_stories.title: Maintain detailed interaction history
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see my interaction history, so that I can review my actions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must record all user actions and ensure data integrity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: A complete history of user interactions must be maintained.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they perform an action, then it should be recorded in the interaction history.

user_stories.title: Secure API connections
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to integrate with the core banking system, so that data remains consistent.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must follow security protocols and maintain performance efficiency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: API connections must be secure, reliable, and efficient.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, when interacting with the core banking system, then data should remain consistent and secure.

user_stories.epic_title: Portal Data Layer and Performance Optimization
user_stories.title: Create dedicated data management layer
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to perform optimally, so that I can access data quickly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must implement caching, indexing, and high availability mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal must provide a responsive experience with minimal data retrieval times.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, when accessing data, then it should be retrieved quickly and accurately.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture diagram outlines a modern, user-friendly self-service banking portal, integrating frontend, backend, database, authentication/authorization, workflow, notification, security, user experience, and monitoring services to ensure comprehensive and secure operations.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been updated to address critical security and reliability issues by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and disaster recovery components. All nodes and edges have been validated, and placeholders were added for missing references. The architecture now aligns more closely with the Azure Well-Architected Framework, achieving a high-quality rating for security, reliability, and performance.
